thread.title: LIVE BLOG: 2017 PBA semifinals Game 2 - Ginebra vs Star Hotshots
thread.title_full: LIVE BLOG: 2017 PBA semifinals Game 2 - Ginebra vs Star Hotshots

author: Rappler.com
title: LIVE BLOG: 2017 PBA semifinals Game 2 - Ginebra vs Star Hotshots
text:
PBA LIVE BLOG: 2017 PBA semifinals Game 2 - Ginebra vs Star Hotshots Bookmark this page to get updates from Game 2 of the semifinals on Saturday, February 11 starting at 5 pm Published 1:46   1:46   
  The Star Hotshots gun for a 2-0 lead in Game 2 of the best-of-7 2017 PBA Philippine Cup semifinals against rival Barangay Ginebra San Miguel on Saturday, February 11, 5 pm at the Mall of Asia Arena. 
Ginebra, on the other hand, will try to level the series after falling in Game 1 , where they were in short supply of offensive firepower. 
Get updates through Rappler's live blog below starting at 5 pm. A Twitter List by rapplerdotcom
